programme.title: Wild Castles 1 - Carcassonne Ep2
programme.desc: Travel to a centuries-old French fortress, home to some of history's greatest empires. Carcassone, once a center of wealth and culture, is now a haven for wildlife. Birds, wild boar, and armies of insects endure in its bountiful surroundings.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 4 Ep4
programme.desc: When a baby mink is abandoned in a store, the team gets to work on some behavioural training. But will this sweet little one be tough enough for the wild when they’re done? Visit with a mange-afflicted coyote who’s enjoying some alone time to heal.

programme.title: Animals at Play 1 - The Power of Playtime Ep1
programme.desc: Explore the ways that animals use play, including young gibbons in Thailand that practice falling from branches, elderly macaques that preserve their brains with playtime, and games that sharpen the profound intelligence of African elephants.

programme.title: Animals at Play 1 - Rules of the Game Ep2
programme.desc: Young hyenas compete in tug of war, mischievous parrots play at picking apart tourists’ cars, and Atlantic spotted dolphins enjoy sophisticated social games amid seaweed—all following specific rules that hone social bonds.

programme.desc: Where the mountains cross international borders, herds of elk and moose live side by side with predators like bears and wolves. The predator/prey relationship is a delicate balance, and the perfect place to see it in action is the Kootenay area of the Rocky Mountains.

programme.title: Wild Rockies 1 - In the Peaks Ep2

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 5 Ep5
programme.desc: A curious raccoon sticks his head a little too far into a peanut butter jar on a sweltering summer day in Toronto. See how the team gets him out of this sticky situation. Then cheer on a painted turtle who needs emergency eye surgery.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 6 Ep6
programme.desc: Follow the medical and rehab teams at Toronto Wildlife Centre as they work to clear a rescued fox of mange and return it to the wild. Elsewhere in the center, meet scores of injured songbirds that have hit downtown buildings on their way south.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 - The Pantanal Ep10
programme.desc: The Pantanal is one of the world’s great reservoirs for plant and animal life. Scientists estimate that it’s home to 80 species of mammals, 650 species of birds, 50 species of reptiles, and over 300 species of fish. It’s the largest tropical wetland on Earth, yet it’s also one of the most unforgiving habitats to call home.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 - Predjama Ep3
programme.desc: Discover the world's largest castle carved into a cave. Predjama, in Slovenia, has provided protection not only for its Medieval human inhabitants, but also serves as a haven for the birds, boars, and mountain goats that live in the region.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - Kesi Turns a Corner Ep3
programme.desc: Watch a milestone moment when two students get their first forest time in years. And another pair of students are confined to the school’s clinic after an accident in the forest leaves Beni with a broken leg and Lala with a broken elbow.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 - Better Together Ep2
programme.desc: The wilds of Zambia are a tough place to live. Here, many animals must come together in groups to help defend territory, protect offspring, find food and overcome predators.

programme.title: Wild Rockies 1 - The Borderlands Ep1
programme.desc: Where the mountains cross international borders, herds of elk and moose live side by side with predators like bears and wolves. The predator/prey relationship is a delicate balance, and the perfect place to see it in action is the Kootenay area of the Rocky Mountains.

programme.desc: Watch a milestone moment when two students get their first forest time in years. And another pair of students are confined to the school’s clinic after an accident in the forest leaves Beni with a broken leg and Lala with a broken elbow.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 - Better Together Ep2
programme.desc: The wilds of Zambia are a tough place to live. Here, many animals must come together in groups to help defend territory, protect offspring, find food and overcome predators.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 1 - Roatan Ep6
programme.desc: Home to Earth’s second-largest barrier reef, Roatán is one of the world’s top dive spots–known for its rare black coral, low-lying nurse sharks, and fearsome-looking barracuda.

programme.title: Over Australia 1 - Arid Heart Ep1
programme.desc: From the vast, dry plains of the interior come some of Australia’s most recognized imagery, such as the monolithic red rock of Uluru and the bounding red kangaroo. But how did the arid center of the continent come to be?

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 5 Ep5
programme.desc: A curious raccoon sticks his head a little too far into a peanut butter jar on a sweltering summer day in Toronto. See how the team gets him out of this sticky situation. Then cheer on a painted turtle who needs emergency eye surgery.

programme.title: Wild Rockies 1 - In the Peaks Ep2
programme.desc: The air is thin and cold, trees can’t even live here -­‐ it’s not exactly a welcoming place to live. But animals like mountain goats and bighorn sheep and even black bears manage to skitter around these peaks with ease. We’ll take a look at how these creatures manage to defy gravity, among some of the highest peaks on the continent.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - Kesi Turns a Corner Ep3
programme.desc: Watch a milestone moment when two students get their first forest time in years. And another pair of students are confined to the school’s clinic after an accident in the forest leaves Beni with a broken leg and Lala with a broken elbow.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 - Better Together Ep2
programme.desc: The wilds of Zambia are a tough place to live. Here, many animals must come together in groups to help defend territory, protect offspring, find food and overcome predators.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 1 - Roatan Ep6
programme.desc: Home to Earth’s second-largest barrier reef, Roatán is one of the world’s top dive spots–known for its rare black coral, low-lying nurse sharks, and fearsome-looking barracuda.

programme.title: Over Australia 1 - Arid Heart Ep1
programme.desc: From the vast, dry plains of the interior come some of Australia’s most recognized imagery, such as the monolithic red rock of Uluru and the bounding red kangaroo. But how did the arid center of the continent come to be?

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 - The Pantanal Ep10
programme.desc: The Pantanal is one of the world’s great reservoirs for plant and animal life. Scientists estimate that it’s home to 80 species of mammals, 650 species of birds, 50 species of reptiles, and over 300 species of fish. It’s the largest tropical wetland on Earth, yet it’s also one of the most unforgiving habitats to call home.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 - Predjama Ep3
programme.desc: Discover the world's largest castle carved into a cave. Predjama, in Slovenia, has provided protection not only for its Medieval human inhabitants, but also serves as a haven for the birds, boars, and mountain goats that live in the region.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 6 Ep6
programme.desc: Follow the medical and rehab teams at Toronto Wildlife Centre as they work to clear a rescued fox of mange and return it to the wild. Elsewhere in the center, meet scores of injured songbirds that have hit downtown buildings on their way south.

programme.title: Wild Rockies 1 - The Borderlands Ep1
programme.desc: Where the mountains cross international borders, herds of elk and moose live side by side with predators like bears and wolves. The predator/prey relationship is a delicate balance, and the perfect place to see it in action is the Kootenay area of the Rocky Mountains.

programme.title: Wild Rockies 1 - In the Peaks Ep2
programme.desc: The air is thin and cold, trees can’t even live here -­‐ it’s not exactly a welcoming place to live. But animals like mountain goats and bighorn sheep and even black bears manage to skitter around these peaks with ease. We’ll take a look at how these creatures manage to defy gravity, among some of the highest peaks on the continent.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 7 Ep7
programme.desc: Follow along as the wildlife rehab team works to treat a baby raccoon, separated from his family, and get him back in the wild before his parents move on. In another part of the center, watch as an orphaned killdeer is introduced to...himself?

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 8 Ep8
programme.desc: Join the rescue team as they respond to a call about an opossum stuck in a fence that turns out not to be the kind of animal that plays dead. Inside the center, a goose with a serious foot injury receives physiotherapy before returning to the wild.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 2 - The Clean Up Crew Ep1
programme.desc: Every day a struggle for survival plays out across Africa. Predators binge on the dead and nature’s undertakers circle above waiting for their chance. When the mighty fall, an army descends to devour what others leave behind for they too must nurture their precious families.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 - Alhambra Ep4
programme.desc: Tour the marvelous Alhambra, a must-see fortress in Spain's Grenada region. Today this world heritage site acts as a refuge for the region’s wildlife. With its many streams and fountains, Alhambra serves amphibian, fish, and bird alike.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - Bears on the Move Ep4
programme.desc: Beni and Lala are going stir crazy in the sick bay, but they must recover before returning to the rough and tumble of class. And at forest school, a termite-foraging lesson inspires class clown Valentino to make a finger-licking discovery.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 - Safari CSI Ep3
programme.desc: Everyday in the Luangwa Valley a carcass is sighted. Each body holds the story that lead them to their death. In Safari CSI we investigate what killed three carcasses that have been uncovered...

programme.desc: Wildlife expert and safari guide Jean Du Plessis travels to Mahale Mountains National Park in the hopes of spending time with the wild chimpanzees that live in the forests of this remote and protected corner of Tanzania.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - Haven of Giants Ep1
programme.desc: Lewa Conservancy is working to return elephants to territory from Mt. Kenya to Samburu National Park. They've also created an elephant exclusion zone to try and restore a damaged ecosystem. Radio tracking collars are used for both initiatives to help conservationists better understand the elephants’ needs - and to see if they're returning to their natural corridors.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Rupert And The Star Child - Rupert, Bill and Raggety meet Astra, a star child who has fallen to earth, but she need their help to return to the starry sky as she's used up too much of her ‘twinkle'

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep3
programme.desc: Huffty Loses His Voice - Huffty has lost his voice. While Raa Raa and his friends try and work out what has happened to it, Huffty has to mime to make himself understood.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep4
programme.desc: Raa Raa Finds A Voice - Raa Raa is upset when Topsy suggests that he should stick to doing "Raa Raa" things. He sets out to prove Topsy wrong. Will the noisy little lion learn that sometimes it's best just to be yourself?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep3
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Flying Shark - Julian is very excited about the Sealife Awareness Day at Greendale School. While he's talking to Pat about it, his dad gets a call from Ben - a special delivery! Pat discovers it's a giant inflatable shark which is to be the surprise centrepiece of the Sealife day. But when Pat stops to help Alf mend a gate, a mix-up with parcel tape ends up with the whale accidentally inflating and floating off... Pat must use his ingenuity to catch the whale and - most important of all - deliver it in time for the special Sealife Awareness event...

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep4
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Blue Flash - Pat must deliver Ben to Greendale School, dressed as superhero, The Blue Flash. But Ben keeps stopping to help people on the way and his costume gets increasingly ruined! Meanwhile at the school, Julian can't wait to meet his hero but Sarah Gilbertson insists that The Blue Flash isn't real... At last Pat arrives at the school with Ben wearing a new costume hastily cobbled together by Pat. Julian isn't fooled. Looks like The Blue Flash isn't real after all... But then Pat tells the kids how Ben helped people on the way and they realise he is a REAL superhero!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep55
programme.desc: Count On Fifi - Fifi and Bumble deliver lots of delicious honey to Poppy's stall. They lose a pot on the way and there isn't enough to go round. Can they find the missing pot, or will Stingo have to go without his honey for tea?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep56
programme.desc: Poppy The Line Dancing Queen - Poppy is having a line dancing party, but none of the other flowertots know how to do it. Will any of them learn to dance in time or will Poppy have to cancel the party?

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Dinmaker Diva - A bungled attempt at a stunt leads to Dennis inadvertently becoming an internet star and Beanotown celebrity! But fame is fleeting and Dennis is soon replaced by Walter’s cat who can play the piano. Dennis has to stage the best stunt yet to gain back his fame, putting Gnasher in peril!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Raiders Of The Lost Sweetie - Mrs Creecher confiscates Dennis’ rare sour sweetie - The Tongue Destroyer! Dennis is desperate to get the sweet back and takes his friends on an adventure to the school’s Confiscatorium, hidden in the depths of Bash Street School!

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep2
programme.desc: From Days Long Ago - The Blue Lion delivers the team to an alien planet where they discover a mysterious castle. Inside, they awaken an alien princess who sends them on a mission to find the remaining lions.

programme.desc: Stink Of Fear: Chapter Two - While Boris and Natasha continue their mission and Bullwinkle tries to overcome his stage-fright to advance in the cooking competition, a secret government agency begins tracking Rocky & Bullwinkle's movement

programme.desc: Wet Hot Ahhh Valley Summer/Grug Vs The Moon - When Eep and Thunk challenge each other in the first-ever dare-off, Thunk faces the deep end - his greatest fear; Grug picks a fight with the moon.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep3
programme.desc: It'S A Secret / Queen Of Thighs - Oh cannot keep a secret when Tip tells him she's planning a surprise party/Lucy's “Queen of Thighs” video goes viral and turns her into a celebrity.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Lucky And The Mysterious Map - During a camping trip Jim gives Lucky and the girls a treasure map that sends them on the adventure of a lifetime

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Boo To You - Burple gets spooked by the legend of a ghost called the Phantom Fang. But when he senses the story is real, he can't get his friends to believe him.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep31
programme.desc: Why Leopard Has Spots - You see there was a time when Leopard didn't have spots. All the animals had something special; Lion had his mane, Peacock his beautiful tail, Zebra his stripes… but Leopard was as plain as plain can be. Then one day Leopard made friends with Puff Adder with his bright colourful spots. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep32
programme.desc: Why Hyena Has Short Back Legs - You see there was a time when Hyena didn't have short back legs. He was always chasing around and nipping other animals on the bottom. Then one day the animals had enough. It was time to teach that naughty Hyena a lesson! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep31
programme.desc: The Case Of The Pink Lettuces - Something very strange is happening at the farm – all Farmer Tom's lettuces have been painted pink! Farmer Tom is really upset so Noddy offers to investigate. After talking to PatPat and Smartysaurus he realises that the Ninjas had asked Smartysaurus to make them pink paint so that they could paint the lettuces. They were using them as pom-poms to cheerlead Pink Ninja as she ran the Toyland Marathon Race! The Ninjas are very sorry that they upset Farmer Tom but he tells them that it's alright. They're welcome to his lettuces but next time, they should ask first! The race takes place and Pink Ninja wins! Thanks Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep32
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Jigsaw Puzzle Pieces - When some pieces from Big Ears' jigsaw puzzle go missing, Noddy investigates: where are the missing pieces? He soon realises someone must have taken them and draws up a list of suspects. Having discounted the Pirates and then the Naughticorns, Noddy is baffled. But when Pat-Pat and the Pockets invite him to share a piece of toy cake, Noddy suddenly has a breakthrough: maybe it wasn't one toy who took lots of pieces but lots of toys who each took one piece. Cloppycorn, Deltoid, Smartysaurus and Carlton all admit they took one piece. They didn't think they were doing any harm! Big Ears gets all the missing pieces back and everyone is at last able to enjoy his jigsaw puzzle of Toyland. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep31
programme.desc: Why Are There So Many Ladybirds? - One winter morning Jess finds lots of ladybird in his barn. Why are they there? That's the Big Question! Mimi tells him that she has lots of ladybirds in her garden in the summer. They're always hungry and brilliant for the plants because they eat all the greenfly. Maybe they're looking for greenfly in his barn? Jess doesn't think so. There are no greenfly in the barn. He goes to ask Baa and Billie for help. They're saying goodbye to Little Bird who's flying away to a warmer country for the winter. Jess thinks maybe the ladybirds are gathering to fly away too and rushes back to his barn to say goodbye. But when he gets there he finds that the ladybirds are now all huddled together and fast asleep. What's going on? Jess goes to ask Willow and finds a hedgehog sleeping under some leaves near the stable. Willow explains that some animals find it hard to find food in the winter, especially if they can't store it, so they eat as much as they can and then go to sleep during the winter. It's called hibe

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep32
programme.desc: How Can I Stop Little Bird Eating The Seeds? - Mimi's really upset with Little Bird who keeps eating all her lettuce seeds. Jess wonders how they can stop her. They try putting out extra food for her but Little Bird just eats everything! Jess wonders if covering the seeds with something so that Little Bird can't reach them would work. Mimi says it's a good idea but the sun won't reach the seeds either – which means they won't grow. The only thing that seems to stop t Little Bird is when she sees Jess and is frightened away. But Jess can't stand still in the vegetable patch forever! Willow sees him and tells him he's being a scarecrow. A scarecrow? Yes, something that scares away the birds. Mimi has a brilliant idea to make the perfect scarecrow. A Jess scarecrow. Little Bird stops eating the lettuce seeds and eats from the lovely bird table they put out for her instead. Hooray!

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Rupert And The Magic Carpet - When Ming gets stuck up a tree, Rupert, Ping Pong and Bill try to rescue her but, thanks to Edward's mistakes, they all get stuck too. Can Edward overcome his fear of heights and save them?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep5
programme.desc: Zebby'S Snack Time - Zebby likes to have a snack when she is feeling tired. Raa Raa thinks this is a great idea and decides to join his friend. Except he thinks they should have their snack in the perfect place… but everywhere they try is just too noisy… I wonder why that could be?!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep6
programme.desc: Finding Noisy - Raa Raa gets carried away when collecting fun noisy objects in the jungle with his friends. Raa Raa wants to keep everything he finds for himself, but soon discovers that his collection isn't much fun with nobody to share it with.

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep5
programme.desc: Postman Pat’S Pancake Party - Pat must deliver eggs, milk, flour and butter to Greendale for the annual Pancake Race. But when Michael mixes all the ingredients together, Pat finds that he instead has to deal with a mixing bowl full to the brim with pancake mix... Meanwhile in Greendale, Sara's attempts at pancake-tossing aren't going well and she soon loses her pancake under the wheels of PC Selby's car. Even worse, Ted Glen's amazing Pancake Machine has run out of mix so Sara won't be able to run the race unless Pat can get to Greendale on time... But Pat gets waylaid by Alf's cows and the pancake mix ends up all over the road. Pat hurries back to Pencaster but Michael now only has butter and flour so Pat has to go and get eggs from Nisha and even some milk from Rosie the goat! With the race about to start, Pat arrives just in time with all the ingredients necessary for Ted to make Sara a fresh pancake. SDS Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep6
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Runaway Remote - Pat doesn't realise today's Special Delivery, a super all-in-one remote control, is quite as powerful as it is! As Jess falls asleep on the buttons, machines all around Pencaster start going haywire. Waiting for the remote, Charlie and Julian are installing a futuristic 'Shop a Bot 3000' robot sales assistant for Mrs Goggins, but they make the mistake of turning it on before the controller arrives. Pat struggles to make his delivery before the shop robot does too much damage!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep57
programme.desc: King Stingo - Aunt Tulip has lost Grubby again. When Stingo finds him, he asks to be made King as a reward. It isn't long before he has gone too far and the tots are all fed up with his demands. Can Fifi get life in the garden back to normal?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep726
programme.desc: Pups save Thundermouth / Pups Save a Class Pet - Shortly after listening to the story of Thundermouth, the pups are on a mission to save elephants spooked by a scary noise. // Mayor Goodway is left in charge of a class pet, but the hamster escapes! Now it's up to the Paw Patrol to save the pet.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep801
programme.desc: Pups Save a Runaway Rooster / Pups Save a Snowbound Cow - Chickaletta and Roosterio run away from a chicken show and get stuck on top of a runaway drone. // When Bettina wanders up Jake's mountain and gets caught in a snowstorm, it's up to the Paw Patrol to bring her safely down.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep802
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sweet Mayor / Pups Save a Magic Trick - Encased in a huge chocolate bunny, Humdinger is carried away by hungry raccoons and ends up floating in Adventure Bay with a curious dolphin. // When a magic trick goes awry, the Adventure Bay Easter Festival is overrun by wild bunnies.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep803
programme.desc: Pups Save a Rubble-Double / Pups Save a Clown - Rubble dreams that he's been taken aboard a spaceship and meets his alien double. When the ship crashes on an alien planet, he needs help. // The Pups must save Humdinger and his kittens when they mess around with Toodles the Clown's tiny clown car.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep804
programme.desc: Pups Stop the Cheetah - When the Cheetah swipes the Paw Patroller to fulfill her nefarious plan to destroy the jungle and build the cheating-est racetrack ever, the Paw Patrol must get a brand vehicle and stop her!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep805
programme.desc: Pups Save The Mustache / Pups Save the Funhouse - The Pups must help to find Mayor Humdinger's mustache after he accidentally shaves it off before it's about to be on the cover of a magazine. // When a carnival train gets stuck in a tunnel, it results in a mountainside funhouse-style wild ride.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep612
programme.desc: Mighty Pups: Pups and the Mighty Twins - Super-bandit, Ladybird, shrieks havoc in Adventure Bay taking all of the town's treasures - including Mayor Goodway! The Mighty Pups team up with new super pals, The Mighty Twins, to save the day - and the Mayor - in this super heroic adventure!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep615
programme.desc: Mighty Pups, Super Paws: Pups Save a Giant Chicken / Mighty Pups, Super Paws: Pups Stop Harold's Deep Freeze - The Ladybird is back and Chickaletta has super powers! The Mighty Twins join the Mighty Pups to save a Giant Chicken and the town. // The Mighty Pups have to stop Harold Humdinger before he puts Adventure Bay in a deep freeze so he can become mayor.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep618
programme.desc: Mighty Pups, Super Paws: Pups and the Big Twin Trick / Mighty Pups, Super Paws: Pups Save the Mega Mayor - The Ladybird is up to her old tricks again, but this time the Mighty Twins have a super trick of their own! // Mayor Humdinger finally gets super powers and it's a total cat-astrophe! The Mighty Pups are summoned to save the Mega Mayor from himself.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep621
programme.desc: Mighty Pups, Charged Up: Mighty Pups Versus the Copycat - The Mighty Pups get Charged Up to take on new super-baddie, The Copycat. It'll take all new powers and gear to take down their most formidable foe to date.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep624
programme.desc: Mighty Pups, Charged Up: Pups Stop a Big Bad Bot / Mighty Pups, Charged Up: Mighty Pups Versus the Dome - When Harold Humdinger uses a GIANT ROBOT to take Adventure Bay and make his OWN town, the Mighty Pups have to save the day! // The COPYCAT is BACK and Adventure Bay needs a Mighty Rescue when he traps the entire town under a GIANT DOME!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep701
programme.desc: Mighty Pups Charged Up: Pups Stop a Humdinger Horde / Mighty Pups Charged Up: Pups Save a Mighty Lighthouse - The Mighty Pups have to save the day when Harold makes a cloning machine! // Harold uses his super powers to turn Cap'n Turbot's lighthouse into a rocket! The Mighty Pups need to Charge Up and stop him!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep823
programme.desc: Pups Save the Floating Goodways / Pups Save the Portable Pet Wash - The Goodways drift out to sea on a swan shaped float and need rescued from a flock of real swans aiming to protect the giant inflatable. // Mayor Humdinger steals Katie's Portable Pet Wash and ends up causing bubble trouble all over town.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep807
programme.desc: Pups Save The Hiding Elephants / Pups Save a Yodeler - Elephants become trapped in the Monkey Temple after a bee frightens them away from their watering hole. // When Wingnut runs away from wolves that are attracted to his yodeling, he ends up trapped in a canyon. The Paw Patrol has to hurry to save him.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep808
programme.desc: Pups Save the Dizzy Dust Express / Pups Save the Treetop Trekkers - When the Dizzy Dust Express appears with no one aboard, the Paw Patrol must stop the runaway train and find the missing passengers. // Ms. Marjorie, Tilly Turbot, and Mayor Goodway get stranded in the treetops on their jungle zip-lining adventure.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep809
programme.desc: Pups Save the Treasure Cruise / Pups Save Rocket Ryder - Mayor Humdinger tricks people to sail icy waters in search of an Antarctic treasure but they all need rescued when they get stranded on shore. // The pups need to rescue Ryder and Alex when they get out of control on a rocket-powered ATV.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep810
programme.desc: Pups and Katie Stop the Barking Kitty Crew! / Pups Save the Glasses - When Mayor Humdinger disrupts Adventure Bay with his "barking" kitties, Katie and the pups must rescue the town. // Cap'n Turbot loses his glasses and creates chaos in his path. It's up to the Paw Patrol to save him and his specs!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep811
programme.desc: Pups vs. A Neon Humdinger / Pups Save A Royal Painting - When Mayor Humdinger's giant neon sign of himself gets loose, the Paw Patrol must stop it from rolling through town. // Sweetie steals a painting of the Princess and attempts to replace it with one of herself.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep812
programme.desc: Pups Save a Chicken Tulip / Pups Stop an Xtreme Shark - When Mayor Humdinger and his mother help Mayor Goodway look for a rare tulip, Humdinger's attempts to have his mom find the flower first gets them all in trouble. // The Pups must save Daring Danny X when a mechanical shark stunt that goes awry.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep813
programme.desc: Pups Save a Show Jumper / Pups Save the Salmon - Winnie Winnington goes looking for a frog to enter in a frog-jumping contest and ends up needing rescued in a swamp. // The pups must help salmon get to the ocean and also need to rescue Alex who gets stuck on top of a dam.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep814
programme.desc: Pups Vs. Ouchy Paws / Pups Save a Glow-in-the-Dark Party - Sid Swashbuckle pretends to be a legendary ghost so that he can take Danny's new skateboard. // Ryder and the Pups race to save Mayor Goodway's Glow-in-the-Dark Party guests when a frightened Alien Boy zaps them into floating space bubbles.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep816
programme.desc: Pups Stop a Super Shaker / Pups Save a Flying Farmhouse - Farmer Al's harvest machine goes haywire and shakes up Adventure Bay, even threatening to rock the Lookout off its foundation. // Farmer Al has a wild dream that the Paw Patrol must rescue he and Yumi when his animals start acting like humans.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep612
programme.desc: Mighty Pups: Pups and the Mighty Twins - Super-bandit, Ladybird, shrieks havoc in Adventure Bay taking all of the town's treasures - including Mayor Goodway! The Mighty Pups team up with new super pals, The Mighty Twins, to save the day - and the Mayor - in this super heroic adventure!

programme.desc: Pups Save the Floating Goodways / Pups Save the Portable Pet Wash - The Goodways drift out to sea on a swan shaped float and need rescued from a flock of real swans aiming to protect the giant inflatable. // Mayor Humdinger steals Katie's Portable Pet Wash and ends up causing bubble trouble all over town.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep817
programme.desc: Pups Save a Box Fort - The Pups must save Rocky and Humdinger from a runaway box fort.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep817
programme.desc: Pups Save Travelin' Travis From Really Big Bill! - When Skye helps Traveling Travis search for Big Bill Island, the misguided explorer gets carried away by a really, really big bird.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Pups Make a Splash / Pups Fall Festival - When Cap’n Turbot’s boat runs aground, Ryder, Zuma, Skye, and Rocky must team up to save it before it sinks! // The PAW Patrol must pick all Farmer Yumi’s fruit before an early snowstorm comes! But how can Chase help?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Pups Save the Sea Turtles / Pups and the Very Big Baby - Ryder, Chase, and Rubble hatch a plan to help sea turtle hatchlings safely cross the road to get to the beach! // There’s a beached baby whale in Adventure Bay! Can the Paw Patrol work together to reunite it with its mother?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Pups and the Kitty-tastrophe / Pups Save a Train - Ryder and the PAW Patrol rescue a lost kitty from the bay, but who will save them from all the mayhem she causes? // Ryder, Rubble, and Rocky call in Chase to help them free Katie and Cali’s train from a rockslide!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Pup Pup Boogie / Pups in a Fog - The PAW Patrol must work quickly to fix the tracks and remove a train car at the Adventure Bay Train Station, before the next train comes. // Ryder and the PAW Patrol battle the clock to fix the lighthouse.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Pup Pup Goose / Pup Pup and Away - Marshal gets a new BFF when a gosling he names “Fuzzy” takes a liking to him. // When Mayor Goodway accidentally takes off in a hot air balloon, Ryder and the Paw Patrol must make a dramatic rescue to save her and win the race!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Pups on Ice / Pups and the Snow Monster - Ryder and the PAW Patrol need to rescue Alex on Jakes mountain. // The pups find strange footprints in the snow on the mountain outside Adventure Bay. Everyone thinks it’s a “snow monster” and it’s scaring the skiers away.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Pups Save the Circus / Pup a Doodle Do - Ryder gets a call from the Circus ringmaster – Ellie the baby elephant has escaped from the circus train! // Mayor Goodway’s purse chicken “Chickaletta” has gone missing. Ryder and the Paw Patrol search Adventure bay.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Pups Pit Crew / Pups Fight Fire - Ryder and the PAW Patrol have to rescue Alex when he takes off on his new “super trike”. // Marshall proves he is a true hero when he stops to put out a real fire on the beach during a race against the clock for a trophy.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep419
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pirate Pups to the Rescue - Carlos and Tracker get stranded on an island in the search for buried treasure.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep426
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save Puplantis - Sid Swashbuckle the Pirate and his first pup mate Arrby steal the giant pearl-making shell that gives Puplantis its magic.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep506
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save the Flying Diving Bell / Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Soggy Farm - Francois and Turbot discover an underwater volcano is going to erupt while Farmer Yumi and Mayor Goodway are unknowingly scuba diving nearby. This is a mission for the Sea Patrol! // Farmer Al's farm is flooded! The PAW Patrol needs to rescue him.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep806
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Water Walker / Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Windsurfer - Mayor Humdinger swipes Francois' water-walking shoes and ends up trapped in a pit-like turtle nest. // A long lost letter inspires Ms. Marjorie to visit an old surfing buddy. The pups spring into action when a nearby volcano erupts.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep422
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Frozen Flounder / Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Narwhal - Cap'n Turbot's boat gets frozen in the Arctic Ice. // The pups use the Sea Patroller to help guide a lost narwhal back home.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep509
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save the Pirated Sea Patroller - The ferris wheel has been stolen by Sid the Pirate and Arrby. The pups set out to bring it back to Adventure Bay! However, Sid comes up with an even more sneaky plan: to steal the Sea Patroller!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep824
programme.desc: Pups Save a Lonesome Walrus - Wally the Walrus searches all over Adventure Bay for Cap'n Turbot and turns the town upside-down in the process.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep801
programme.desc: Pups Save a Runaway Rooster - Chickaletta and Roosterio run away from a chicken show and get stuck on top of a runaway drone.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Pups Save the Bunnies / Puptacular - Farmer Yumi's carrots are disappearing and she calls Ryder and the Paw Patrol for help. // Katie is excited to be entering one of the Paw Patrol pups into a puppy grooming competition "Puptacular" in the next town.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Pups Save the Bay / Pups Save a Goodway - Ryder and the PAW Patrol clean up a small oil spill in the water to save the animals in Adventure Bay. // When Adventure Bay’s famous statue ends up at the bottom of the Bay, Ryder and the PAW Patrol have to find a clever way to bring it back!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Pups Save a Hoedown / Pups Save Alex - It’s Adventure Bay Western Days, when a herd of cows escape from a train at the railway station! // When their friend Alex decides he wants to be a member of the PAW Patrol the PUPS and Ryder let him come along for the ride.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Pups Save a School Day / Pups Turn on the Lights - Alex loses his back pack on the first day of school! Ryder and the Paw Patrol need to help him find it. // It’s Chase’s birthday and the pups are planning a surprise party. A storm causes the power to go out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Pups Save a Pool Day / Circus Pup-Formers - It’s a hot day and the pups head for the water park – but the pool is empty! Paw Patrol to the rescue. // When the animals don’t show up in time for the Circus to start; Ryder and the Paw Patrol step in to help.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Pups Save a Super Pup / Pups Save Ryder's Robot - Rubble is pretending to be a super pup but get’s himself in some trouble. Ryder and the Paw Patrol have to save Rubble! // When Ryder’s Robot Pup breaks and starts going wild around Adventure Bay, it takes the whole Paw Patrol to help Ryder find it.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Pups Save a Monkey / Pups Save a Hoot - When Mandy the monkey escapes from her cage on the train, Ryder and the PAW Patrol are lead on a wild chase! // During a bad wind storm, Ryder and the PAW Patrol have to save an Owl trapped in a blown over tree and reunite her baby.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Pups Save a Bat / Pups Save a Toof - A baby Bat decides to take a nap hanging from the Town Hall’s bell and Mayor Goodway can’t ring it. // Alex is afraid to go to the dentist, so Chase and the PAW Patrol work together to show Alex that fears can be overcome.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Pups Save the Camping Trip / Pups and the Trouble with Turtles - Skye and Rocky go on their first camping trip, but when Chickaletta gets caught in a crevice, they have to call in the PAW Patrol. // Tons of baby turtles start to pop up all over town and it’s up to Ryder and the Pups to get them back to their pond.

programme.desc: Pups Save a Lonesome Walrus - Wally the Walrus searches all over Adventure Bay for Cap'n Turbot and turns the town upside-down in the process.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Pups Great Race / Pups Take the Cake - It's Race Day and the pups are about to race each other across the town to see who is the fastest. // Mr. Porter enters a cake competition and needs Ryder and the pups to help him. The race is on to get the cake baked and to the competition on time!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Pups Take the Cake - Mr. Porter enters a cake competition and needs Ryder and the pups to help him. The race is on to get their cake baked and to the competition on time!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep126
programme.desc: Pups Save a Hoedown - Cap'n Turbot accidentally stumbles into a secret cavern that was once a pirate's hideout. When the PAW Patrol rescues him, they find an incomplete treasure map. The adventure is on to find the sunken pirate treasure!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Pups Save the Penguins / Pups Save a Dolphin Pup - Someone has been swiping fish off Cap’n Turbot’s boat, so he calls Ryder and the PAW Patrol to help investigate. // Dolphin Pup accidentally swims into a shallow water stream! Now it’s up to Ryder and PAW Patrol to get her back into the Bay.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Pups Save a School Day / Pups Turn on the Lights - Alex loses his back pack on the first day of school! Ryder and the Paw Patrol need to help him find it. // It’s Chase’s birthday and the pups are planning a surprise party. A storm causes the power to go out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Pups Save a Pool Day / Circus Pup-Formers - It’s a hot day and the pups head for the water park – but the pool is empty! Paw Patrol to the rescue. // When the animals don’t show up in time for the Circus to start; Ryder and the Paw Patrol step in to help.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Pups Save a Super Pup / Pups Save Ryder's Robot - Rubble is pretending to be a super pup but get’s himself in some trouble. Ryder and the Paw Patrol have to save Rubble! // When Ryder’s Robot Pup breaks and starts going wild around Adventure Bay, it takes the whole Paw Patrol to help Ryder find it.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Pups Save a Monkey / Pups Save a Hoot - When Mandy the monkey escapes from her cage on the train, Ryder and the PAW Patrol are lead on a wild chase! // During a bad wind storm, Ryder and the PAW Patrol have to save an Owl trapped in a blown over tree and reunite her baby.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Pups Save a Bat / Pups Save a Toof - A baby Bat decides to take a nap hanging from the Town Hall’s bell and Mayor Goodway can’t ring it. // Alex is afraid to go to the dentist, so Chase and the PAW Patrol work together to show Alex that fears can be overcome.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Pups Save the Camping Trip / Pups and the Trouble with Turtles - Skye and Rocky go on their first camping trip, but when Chickaletta gets caught in a crevice, they have to call in the PAW Patrol. // Tons of baby turtles start to pop up all over town and it’s up to Ryder and the Pups to get them back to their pond.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep419
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pirate Pups to the Rescue - Carlos and Tracker get stranded on an island in the search for buried treasure.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep426
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save Puplantis - Sid Swashbuckle the Pirate and his first pup mate Arrby steal the giant pearl-making shell that gives Puplantis its magic.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep506
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save the Flying Diving Bell / Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Soggy Farm - Francois and Turbot discover an underwater volcano is going to erupt while Farmer Yumi and Mayor Goodway are unknowingly scuba diving nearby. This is a mission for the Sea Patrol! // Farmer Al's farm is flooded! The PAW Patrol needs to rescue him.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep806
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Water Walker / Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Windsurfer - Mayor Humdinger swipes Francois' water-walking shoes and ends up trapped in a pit-like turtle nest. // A long lost letter inspires Ms. Marjorie to visit an old surfing buddy. The pups spring into action when a nearby volcano erupts.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep422
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Frozen Flounder / Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Narwhal - Cap'n Turbot's boat gets frozen in the Arctic Ice. // The pups use the Sea Patroller to help guide a lost narwhal back home.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep509
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save the Pirated Sea Patroller - The ferris wheel has been stolen by Sid the Pirate and Arrby. The pups set out to bring it back to Adventure Bay! However, Sid comes up with an even more sneaky plan: to steal the Sea Patroller!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep824
programme.desc: Pups Save a Lonesome Walrus - Wally the Walrus searches all over Adventure Bay for Cap'n Turbot and turns the town upside-down in the process.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Pups Great Race / Pups Take the Cake - It's Race Day and the pups are about to race each other across the town to see who is the fastest. // Mr. Porter enters a cake competition and needs Ryder and the pups to help him. The race is on to get the cake baked and to the competition on time!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Pups Take the Cake - Mr. Porter enters a cake competition and needs Ryder and the pups to help him. The race is on to get their cake baked and to the competition on time!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep126
programme.desc: Pups Save a Hoedown - Cap'n Turbot accidentally stumbles into a secret cavern that was once a pirate's hideout. When the PAW Patrol rescues him, they find an incomplete treasure map. The adventure is on to find the sunken pirate treasure!

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep62
programme.desc: Trailer - When it's time for the Tubby Custard Ride, there's a special trailer the Teletubbies haven't seen before. It's for The Noo-Noo who gets to go on a special Tubby Custard Ride.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S2) Ep7
programme.desc: Bird - Dee encourages a friend to say 'bird' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of different birds including a swimming bird, a napping bird and even a rapping bird!

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep61
programme.desc: Training Wheels - Tinpo helps Logi-Po to feel part of the team when he can't pull Uni-Board tricks like Doug-Po.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) Ep21
programme.desc: It's time to pick strawberries - After going strawberry picking at the strawberry farm, JoJo and Gran Gran have lots of strawberries left over. So they decide to make delicious jam to preserve the berries for longer.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep49
programme.desc: Dr. Funny Bones - Following advice from Gran, Monty tells Stan a joke to keep his mind preoccupied from a splinter in his finger. This leads him to wonder if laughter really is the best medicine.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep48
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - During a game of hide and seek, Monty wonders whether there is a way to hide other than in or behind something.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep50
programme.desc: Shaun - Bluey and Bingo want a pet. To show them how much work they'd be in for, Dad gets to transform his hand into their old friend Shaun, a chaotic, undisciplined Emu with a taste for trouble.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep21
programme.desc: The Mystery Badge - The squirrels have to solve the mystery of the missing red ruby.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep20
programme.desc: The Crazy Golf Badge - It's crazy golf time and the everyone has to make their own courses.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep19
programme.desc: The Art Badge - The Squirrels learn about different types of art and what inspires it, while preparing their own pieces for Tino the artistic mouse's Woodland Biennale.

programme.desc: Asparagus - Dad tells Bluey to mind her manners at the table - they're not animals. But when Bluey gets her hands on a stick of magic asparagus, she shows them everyone's got a wild side.

programme.desc: Lalo Land / Maybe-Sitter - The Casagrandes prepare Lalo for his big audition to be Phoebe Powers' new canine sidekick! // With the adults out for the night, Bobby and Carlota take turns watching the kids - and going to a party!

programme.title: It's Pony S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Family Free for All / Lucky Pony - When the Bramleys are picked to be contestants on a game show Annie worries that Pony's excitement will ruin their chance to be on TV. // Pony believes he's a good luck charm and the reason Annie's suddenly a track star.

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures S03 Ep306
programme.desc: Duke Time / Harpy Stubbs - An exhausted Duke Detain takes his first day off after an uncharacteristic mistake on duty. // An unlikely friendship develops between Poppy Starr, the world's biggest pop star, and Harl Hubbs, the city's humble, helpful handyman.

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Quantifying Intrepidness / Green Light - Maddy becomes intrepid reporter, Nomi D. Plume and uses her anonymity as a kid to break exclusive scoops to save the paper. // Fendrich tries to steal a high-tech Eco-Power device. Wheeler sends the reluctant Alan to stop him.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep418
programme.desc: Mega Bounce Battle - The boys disobey Dave's orders to not play a dangerous game then have to hide their injuries when they get hurt.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep418
programme.desc: Gossip Guy - The school newspaper has a sudden increase in sales when a gossip column appears poking fun at other students.

programme.desc: Chimpmania - Jeanette and the Chipmunks orchestrate a break-in at Bocarter's house to rescue a chimpanzee he keeps in a cage.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep419
programme.desc: Dad Jokes - Alvin is alarmed that Dave will be hosting an auction where he'll have to tell jokes because he's not that funny.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep180
programme.desc: Patrick-Man! / Gary's New Toy - Patrick becomes the superhero Patrick-Man, who intends to clean up Bikini Bottom—whether it wants it or not. // Gary becomes obsessed with his new red ball, forcing SpongeBob to take drastic measures to intervene.

programme.title: Danger Force S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Family Lies - It's Parents' Night at SW.A.G. and Ray must get Danger Force to take a picture with their parents in the school or be shut down. But things get complicated when Chapa hires Jake Hart to be her fake dad.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: Fairly Odder S01 Ep109

programme.desc: Party Like It's 1899/There Wolf - Daphne brings the gang to a Victorian murder mystery party, so they can dress up and solve a fake mystery. But when an actual Headless Count starts kidnapping people, they must tackle the real caper!

programme.title: Be Cool Scooby-Doo! Ep7/Ep33
programme.desc: Screama Donna/Halloween - To solve the mystery of a ghostly performer haunting her former venue, the gang has to pretend to be a rock band themselves! But can they solve the case before Velma has to get on stage and sing?

programme.title: Be Cool Scooby-Doo! Ep12/Ep39
programme.desc: Grand Scam/Silver Scream - Shaggy takes the Gang to the Minor League Baseball stadium of his youth only to learn that it's about to be shut down because a Ghostly Baseball Player is scaring away the fans - and the team!

programme.title: Tom And Jerry Theatricals Ep3/Ep15/Ep29/Ep46/Ep59/Ep71/Ep86/Ep100
programme.desc: Barbecue Brawl/Cat Napping/Fit To Be Tied/Jerry and the Lion/Love that Pup/Mucho Mouse/Puss Gets The Boot/Solid Serenade - Spike tries to ensure that Tom doesn't ruin his father-son barbeque.

programme.title: Unikitty Ep85/Ep43/Ep4/Ep24/Ep77
programme.desc: Too Cool/Election Day/Crushing Defeat/Tasty Heist/Wiener Club - Puppycorn needs a lesson in how to be cool. The gang is more than happy to teach him, until his coolness unexpectedly freezes the whole kingdom!

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls Ep104/Ep144/Ep188/Ep137/Ep177
programme.desc: The Wrinklegruff Gals/Breaking Bliss/Aliver/Halt and Catch Silico/Toy Ploy - Sick of being the tiniest kids at a new school the girls convince the Professor to create a potion to make them older! They take too much and become senior citizens instead.

programme.title: Ben 10 Ep104/Ep144/Ep184/Ep206/Ep236
programme.desc: The Ring Leader/Bon Voyage/Rath Of Con/The Chupaca-Bro/The Monsters In Your Head - While winning big on a Sumo Slammers video game, Ben gets the idea to win a real wrestling match - until an intimidating wrestler named Iron Kyle decides to make it a true challenge.

programme.title: Chowder Ep2B/Ep22B/Ep12B/Ep42B
programme.desc: Chowder's Girlfriend/The Flying Flinger Lingons/Chowder and Mr. Fugu/The Belgian Waffle Slobber-Barker - When Panini sets her love-struck eyes on Chowder, he tries every trick he can think of to convince her he's not her boyfriend.

programme.title: Inspector Gadget Ep202B/Ep207B/Ep212B/Ep217B/Ep222B
programme.desc: Growing Like MAD/Talent Show Off/See You Later, Super Gator/Too Many Talons/Parched Nemesis - MAD develops a plant-mutating serum, but when Talon uses it on Penny's prize pepper plant, it comes back to bite him. Gadget heads to the park to interrogate the local foliage on the matter.

programme.title: Foster's Home For Imaginary Friends Ep17/Ep4
programme.desc: Sight for Sore Eyes / Bloo's Brothers/Busted - A Seeing Eye Friend loses his blind pal

programme.title: Unikitty Ep5/Ep48/Ep84/Ep73/Ep102
programme.desc: Kitchen Chaos/Landlord Lord/Stop The Presses/Time Capsule/The Unikingdom Awards - Unikitty and the others set out to clean the kitchen.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls Ep105/Ep145/Ep189/Ep136/Ep176
programme.desc: Strong Armed/Blisstersweet Symphony/The Long Skate Home/Poorbucks/Not So Secret Service - When Bubbles breaks her arm and gets a powerful robotic cast, she must learn to stop being timid and embrace her "smashy side" to defeat the sleazy, sinister Pack Rat!

programme.title: Ben 10 Ep105/Ep145/Ep185/Ep207/Ep239
programme.desc: Take 10/The 11th Alien Part 1/King Of The Castle/Buggy Out/Queen Of Bees - While trying to film his own indie film, Ben accidentally lets the Bug Gang go free and when he takes the fight to their hidden lair, Ben has to take on their narcissistic leader - the Ant Queen.

programme.title: Be Cool Scooby-Doo! Ep3/Ep29

programme.title: Be Cool Scooby-Doo! Ep8/Ep34
programme.desc: If You Can't Scooby-Doo the Time Don't Scooby-Doo the Crime/The Curse of Kaniaku - Fred visits The Vault, a high security prison from which no convict has ever escaped. But when a convict ghost terrorises the prison, Fred has to solve the mystery and rethink his stance on justice!

programme.title: Be Cool Scooby-Doo! Ep13/Ep40
programme.desc: Me, Myself, and A.I./Fright of Hand - When an artificial intelligence takes over the building of a trendy tech company, the gang has to solve the computerised mystery and maybe learn a lesson about relying too much on technology.

programme.title: Esme & Roy Ep205/Ep248
programme.desc: The Book Bind/The Long Goodnight - Esme and Roy are taking Tillie to the library, but they run into trouble when the book she wants is already checked out.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Dern vs. Yan
programme.desc: Main Event - With wins in five of her last six bouts, a stretch that has seen her defeat Tecia Torres and score Performance of the Night victories over Nina Nunes, Randa Markos and Hannah Cifers, Mackenzie Dern is on the verge of entering the strawweight title race, but to get there, she has to defeat China’s Yan Xiaonan in the main event of UFC Fight Night on October 1 at the APEX in Las Vegas. Owner of wins over Angela Hill, Karolina Kowalkiewicz and Claudia Gadelha, Yan has proven to be a top contender at 115 pounds, but now she will meet her toughest test yet in the decorated jiu-jitsu black belt who is hungry to make her way to the top of the division
